name: agent-flow
title: AgentFlow
description: AgentFlow is an intelligent agentic workflow system that manages tasks, dependencies, and reasoning for AI Agents.

tools.name: plan_idea
tools.description: Draft architectural concepts and initial planning for a project or feature.

tools.name: analyze_idea
tools.description: Perform deep technical analysis and feasibility study on a planned idea.

tools.name: reflect_idea
tools.description: Critically reflect on a plan to identify edge cases, security risks, and technical debt.

tools.name: process_thought
tools.description: A high-fidelity thinking tool for multi-step reasoning with design tokens and focus modes.

tools.name: split_tasks
tools.description: Decompose a refined plan into a topological graph of actionable tasks.

tools.name: execute_task
tools.description: Mark a task as in-progress and begin execution logic.

tools.name: verify_task
tools.description: Validate task completion against criteria before finalizing.

tools.name: get_project_context
tools.description: Automatically detect and retrieve project-specific history and context.

tools.name: reorder_tasks
tools.description: Manually reorder tasks while maintaining strict dependency integrity.
